body: Alright, so the problem that now exist is that in 1vs1, I am rubbish, I can't do it properly. All that I am asking is that, tell me how I can improve! Please tell me how! I know that I have to practice but please, list the techniques down below!
body_tagged: Alright, so the problem that now exist is that in 1vs1, I am rubbish, I can't do it properly. All that I am asking is that, tell me how I can improve! Please tell me how! I know that I have to practice but please, list the techniques down below!
title: Someone tell me how I could improve in PvP?

replies.body:
This
Not advertising, don't bother removing my comment.
replies.body_tagged:
This
Not advertising, don't bother removing my comment.

replies.body:
You are a very good jitter clicker. BUT
-Lower your fov to normal or at least 80-100. Trust me. I used to use QP until i switched to 80 and it helps so much. Some can do better on QP but again, this is just my advice. 
Other than that, you have to develop your own style. Practice practice practice.
replies.body_tagged:
You are a very good jitter clicker. BUT
-Lower your fov to normal or at least 80-100. Trust me. I used to use QP until i switched to 80 and it helps so much. Some can do better on QP but again, this is just my advice. 
Other than that, you have to develop your own style. Practice practice practice.

replies.body: Thanks Guys! Putting FOV on 100 and Practicing suggested techniques of YLO!
replies.body_tagged: Thanks Guys! Putting FOV on 100 and Practicing suggested techniques of YLO!

replies.body: I find that doing full circles out of all strafing gets you hit the most, so basicly trying mix up your directions to confuse the enemy. I'm pretty bad at PvP, though I haven't done PvP like this for as long as other people.
replies.body_tagged: I find that doing full circles out of all strafing gets you hit the most, so basicly trying mix up your directions to confuse the enemy. I'm pretty bad at PvP, though I haven't done PvP like this for as long as other people.

replies.body: The thing with me is that, I just go head on, I like charge at them, like a bull! And even if I was on 3 hearts and the other person had 9 hearts, I would just try and kill him!
replies.body_tagged: The thing with me is that, I just go head on, I like charge at them, like a bull! And even if I was on 3 hearts and the other person had 9 hearts, I would just try and kill him!

replies.body: I should add that the best way to improve at sword PvP is Pot PvP on kohi (I won't give the IP) and the best way to improve at bow PvP is the Archer ladder on Badlion (Not giving IP) or public games of OCN and Avicus.
replies.body_tagged: I should add that the best way to improve at sword PvP is Pot PvP on kohi (I won't give the IP) and the best way to improve at bow PvP is the Archer ladder on Badlion (Not giving IP) or public games of OCN and Avicus.
